messages.content: Hello! Welcome to Gloss and Glow Hair Salon. I'm your AI receptionist. How can I help you today?
Hi there, I am looking for a haircut.
Great choice! Our stylist Riya specializes in haircuts and styling. Would you like to book an appointment with her?
Hello! Welcome to Gloss and Glow Hair Salon. I'm your AI receptionist. How can I help you today?
Yes, I would like to book an appointment for Monday at 11am. My email id is shrest4236 at gmail.com.
Thank you for the details! Just to confirm, we have you down for a haircut with Riya on Monday at 11:00 AM. Could you please provide your full name?
Hello! Welcome to Gloss and Glow Hair Salon. I'm your AI receptionist. How can I help you today?
My full name is Shresth Pandey.
Thank you, Shresth Pandey! To confirm, you have an appointment for a haircut with Riya on Monday at 11:00 AM, and I will send a confirmation email to shrest4236@gmail.com. Does everything look good?
Hello! Welcome to Gloss and Glow Hair Salon. I'm your AI receptionist. How can I help you today?
Yes, everything looks good. Please schedule the appointment.

Your appointment for a haircut with Riya on Monday at 11:00 AM is all set! You will receive a confirmation email at shrest4236@gmail.com shortly. If you have any other questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask. Thank you, and we look forward to seeing you!
